ai-analytics.name: AI & Analytics

cloud-platform.name: Cloud Platform
cloud-platform.description: Comprehensive cloud infrastructure platform with auto-scaling and management capabilities

featureDetails.0: Automatically adjusts resources based on workload to ensure optimal performance and cost efficiency.
featureDetails.1: Provides fast content delivery through globally distributed CDN.
featureDetails.2: Identifies issues immediately with real-time performance monitoring and alerts.
featureDetails.3: Ensures service stability with industry-leading uptime guarantees.

benefits.0: Cloud Platform provides infrastructure that automatically scales with your business growth.
benefits.1: Guarantees fast response times and reliable service from anywhere in the world.
benefits.2: Focus solely on application development without complex infrastructure management.

data-analytics.name: Data Analytics Suite
data-analytics.description: Advanced analytics platform for business intelligence and data visualization

featureDetails.0: Processes and analyzes large volumes of data in real-time.
featureDetails.1: AI discovers hidden patterns and insights from your data.
featureDetails.2: Easily create custom dashboards tailored to your business needs.
featureDetails.3: Predicts future trends based on historical data.

benefits.0: Improve business outcomes through data-driven decision making.
benefits.1: Easily understand complex data through intuitive visualizations.
benefits.2: Save time as AI automatically discovers important insights.

ml-platform.name: ML Platform
ml-platform.description: End-to-end machine learning platform for model development and deployment

featureDetails.0: Quickly find optimal models through automated machine learning.
featureDetails.1: Track and manage all versions of your models.
featureDetails.2: Test multiple models simultaneously to select the best performance.
featureDetails.3: Deploy models to production with one click.

benefits.0: Build powerful AI models even without machine learning expertise.
benefits.1: Streamline the entire process from model development to deployment.
benefits.2: Improve AI model accuracy through continuous enhancement.

security-shield.name: Security Shield
security-shield.description: Comprehensive security solution protecting infrastructure and data

featureDetails.0: Protects your services from large-scale DDoS attacks.
featureDetails.1: Blocks various attacks against web applications.
featureDetails.2: Identifies security threats in real-time with AI-based threat detection.

benefits.0: Safely protect your business from the latest security threats.
benefits.2: Respond quickly and recover when security incidents occur.

compliance-manager.name: Compliance Manager
compliance-manager.description: Automated compliance management and audit reporting

featureDetails.0: Continuously verify compliance status through regular automated audits.
featureDetails.2: Centrally manage security policies across the organization.
featureDetails.3: Supports various regulations including ISO, SOC2, GDPR.

benefits.0: Save time and costs by automating manual audit work.
benefits.1: Minimize compliance violation risks and meet regulatory requirements.
benefits.2: Respond quickly by monitoring real-time compliance status.

serverless-functions.name: Serverless Functions
serverless-functions.description: Execute code without server management with auto-scaling capabilities

featureDetails.0: Optimize costs by paying only for what you use.
featureDetails.1: Automatically scales up and down based on traffic.
featureDetails.2: Supports various languages including Node.js, Python, Go.
featureDetails.3: Automatically collects function execution logs and performance metrics.

benefits.0: Focus solely on code development without server management burden.
benefits.1: Automatically responds to traffic changes to maintain optimal performance.
benefits.2: Economical as you only pay for resources used.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: LavarWave protects and respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content:
We may collect the following information:
• Personal identification information such as name, email address, and phone number
• Account information and login credentials
• Usage data and analytics information
• Information through cookies and similar tracking technologies

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.content:
The collected information is used for:
• Providing and improving services
• Customer support and inquiry responses
• Sending marketing communications (with consent)
• Security and fraud prevention
• Compliance with legal obligations

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content:
We do not share your personal information with third parties except:
• With your explicit consent
• When sharing with trusted partners to provide services
• To comply with legal requirements

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the following rights:
• Access and request a copy of your personal information
• Request correction of inaccurate information
• Request deletion of personal information in certain circumstances
• Object to or restrict the processing of personal information

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or website notice.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: These Terms of Service apply to the use of LavarWave's website and services. By using our services, you agree to these terms.

services.title: Services
services.content: LavarWave provides innovative technology solutions and services. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue services without prior notice.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: When creating an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining account security and all activities that occur under your account.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Use
prohibited.content:
You may not use the services in the following ways:
• For illegal purposes
• To infringe on the rights of others
• To transmit malicious code or viruses
• To interfere with the proper operation of services
• To attempt unauthorized access

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, features, and technology of the services are the exclusive property of LavarWave or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Services are provided 'as is' and 'as available'. We make no warranties regarding the accuracy, completeness, or usefulness of the services.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, LavarWave shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use of services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account for any reason without prior notice. Upon termination, you must immediately cease using the services.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: This Cookie Policy explains how LavarWave uses cookies and similar technologies on our website.

what.title: What Are Cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. Cookies help websites recognize you, remember your settings, and provide a better user experience.

types.title: Types of Cookies
types.content:
We use the following types of cookies:
• Essential cookies: Required for basic website functionality
• Performance cookies: Collect information about how the website is used
• Functional cookies: Provide enhanced functionality and personalization
• Targeting cookies: Deliver relevant advertising

usage.title: Cookie Usage
usage.content:
We use cookies for:
• Maintaining website functionality and security
• Analyzing performance and usage patterns
• Personalizing user experience
• Delivering relevant advertising

control.title: Cookie Control
control.content: You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of some website features.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page and the 'Last Updated' date will be revised.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the basic functionality of the website and cannot be disabled.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: These cookies collect information about how visitors use the website to help improve performance.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies provide enhanced functionality and personalization and remember user preferences.

targeting.title: Targeting Cookies
targeting.description: These cookies are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests.
